channel.title: International CES Attendee News
channel.description: Stay up-to-date on the latest developments for 2008 International CES attendees.

item.title: President of the Republic of Rwanda Paul Kagame to Speak at CES
item.description: New CES program explores technology in emerging economies.

item.title: Breaking News: Innovations Honorees Announced
item.description: A waterproof camcorder, miniature photo frame, a wrist mouse and many more take top honors.

item.title: The World's Coolest Tradeshow Just Became the Greenest
item.description: CES makes history as the largest carbon-neutral trade event ever.

item.title: Bloggers Give CES Attendees Straight Talk
item.description: The ins and outs of CES are revealed in daily posts.

item.title: Two New Speakers Added to International Retail Power Panel
item.description: Topics include recent holiday selling season and the hottest selling technologies.

item.title: Gaming Technologies Expand Presence at the 2008 International CES
item.description: CES’ major gaming exhibitors include Commodore Gaming, Entropia Universe, Red Lion Interactive, Shuttle Computers and War Machine.

item.title: Chief Yahoo! Kicks Off 2008 Industry Insider Series at the Las Vegas Hilton Theater
item.description: Jerry Yang co-founded and leads one of the most influential and ground-breaking Internet navigational sites in history.

item.title: Industry Insider Lineup Just Announced
item.description: New lineup includes Best Buy and Circuit City execs among others.

item.title: Nicholas Negroponte to Deliver Keynote for Technology and Emerging Countries Program at CES
item.description: Founder of the One Laptop Per Child project and the MIT Media Lab slated to speak in January.

item.title: Who will take home an Emmy at the 2008 International CES?
item.description: And the nominees are...

item.title: The John Lennon Educational Tour Bus Rolls to CES
item.description: Oh Yoko! Show us the new tour bus!

item.title: CES to Host Technology and Engineering Emmy Awards
item.description: Monday, January 7, 2008, The Venetian, Bellini 2101

item.title: Interactive Floor Plans Now Available
item.description: If you want to know every detail of the show floor, then we have the tool for you.

item.title: New Key Attraction: Content@CES
item.description: Content bring consumer technology to life at CES.

item.title: Ultimate Special on the Ultimate Pass
item.description: Limited offer includes VIP passes to all keynote addresses.

item.title: Reminder: Contact CES Hotels Directly to Ensure CES Rates
item.description: CES does not use or endorse housing agencies or bureaus.

item.title: Book Rooms at The Venetian Now
item.description: Limited number of rooms available under CES block won't last long.

item.title: TechZone Spotlight: Sustainable Technologies
item.description: Every person on this planet can and will benefit from the latest CE advances.

item.title: CNET: Explore a World Gone Digital
The Art of Learning: Conference Program Registration Now Open
item.description: New sessions and speakers make for the most impressive session lineup in CES history.

item.title: Summer Special Extended for Monorail Passes
item.description: Save 40 percent if you purchase now.

item.title: Airport Improvements May Make Travel Easy for CES Goers
item.description: $12 million project at McCarran airport underway.

item.title: Comcast CEO Throws His Hat in the 2008 CES Ring
item.description: Brian L. Roberts rounds out impressive keynote lineup.
